articles.description: A health worker in Alaska had a serious allergic reaction after getting Pfizer’s coronavirus vaccine Tuesday and was hospitalized, according to three people familiar with official reports of the person’s health. The person is in stable condition. The reaction…

articles.author: Alicia Robinson
articles.title: First COVID-19 vaccine doses given in Orange County - OCRegister
articles.description: Staff at St. Joseph Hospital and UC Irvine Medical Center will be some of the earliest in the county to get inoculated with the Pfizer vaccine; doses of the Moderna vaccine are expected soon.
